trans-unit.source: Provides a simple implementation of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: 提供的簡單實作<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer"></xref>介面。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The ServiceContainer object can be used to store and provide services.
trans-unit.target: ServiceContainer 物件可以用來儲存，並提供服務。

trans-unit.source: ServiceContainer implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer> interface.
trans-unit.target: 實作 ServiceContainer<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer>介面。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer>

trans-unit.source: The ServiceContainer object can be created using a constructor that adds a parent <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer> through which services can be optionally added to or removed from all parent <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer> objects, including the immediate parent <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 加入父<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer>透過此服務可以選擇性地加入或移除從所有父<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer>物件，包括直屬父<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer></xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer></xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer>的建構函式建立的 ServiceContainer 物件

trans-unit.source: To add or remove a service from all <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer> implementations that are linked to this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer> through parenting, call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.AddService%2A> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.RemoveService%2A> method overload that accepts a Boolean value indicating whether to promote the service request.
trans-unit.target: 新增或移除服務從所有<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer>實作連結到這<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer>父代，透過呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.AddService%2A>或<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.RemoveService%2A>方法多載會接受布林值，指出是否要升級的服務要求。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.RemoveService%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.AddService%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> attribute applied to this class has the following <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.Resources%2A> property value: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] ><xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>屬性套用至這個類別具有下列<xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.Resources%2A>屬性值︰ <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.Resources%2A> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> does not affect desktop applications (which are typically started by double-clicking an icon, typing a command, or entering a URL in a browser).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>不會影響桌面應用程式 （啟動方式一般都按兩下圖示、 輸入命令，或在瀏覽器輸入 URL）。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> class or [SQL Server Programming and Host Protection Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>類別或[SQL Server 程式設計和主機保護屬性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer"></xref> class using the specified parent service provider.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer"></xref>類別使用指定的父服務提供者。

trans-unit.source: The service container uses this service object provider to retrieve services, if they are not available locally in the container.
trans-unit.target: 服務容器會使用此服務的物件提供者來擷取服務，如果不提供本機的容器。

trans-unit.source: A parent service provider.
trans-unit.target: 父服務提供者。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified service to the service container.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的服務加入至服務容器。

trans-unit.source: The type of service to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入之服務型別。

trans-unit.source: A callback object that can create the service.
trans-unit.target: 可以建立服務的回呼物件。

trans-unit.source: This allows a service to be declared as available, but delays creation of the object until the service is requested.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓服務可以宣告為可用，但延遲建立物件，直到要求服務。

trans-unit.source: serviceType or callback is .
trans-unit.target: serviceTypeor callback is .

trans-unit.source: A service of type serviceType already exists in the container.
trans-unit.target: 型別的服務 serviceType 已經存在容器中。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified service to the service container.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的服務加入至服務容器。

trans-unit.source: The type of service to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入之服務型別。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the service to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的服務執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This object must implement or inherit from the type indicated by the `serviceType` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此物件必須實作或繼承自所指定的類型`serviceType`參數。

trans-unit.source: serviceType or serviceInstance is .
trans-unit.target: serviceTypeor serviceInstance is .

trans-unit.source: A service of type serviceType already exists in the container.
trans-unit.target: 型別的服務 serviceType 已經存在容器中。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified service to the service container.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的服務加入至服務容器。

trans-unit.source: The type of service to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入之服務型別。

trans-unit.source: A callback object that can create the service.
trans-unit.target: 可以建立服務的回呼物件。

trans-unit.source: This allows a service to be declared as available, but delays creation of the object until the service is requested.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓服務可以宣告為可用，但延遲建立物件，直到要求服務。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this service should be added to any parent service containers; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此服務應該加入至任何父項服務容器。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: serviceType or callback is .
trans-unit.target: serviceTypeor callback is .

trans-unit.source: A service of type serviceType already exists in the container.
trans-unit.target: 型別的服務 serviceType 已經存在容器中。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified service to the service container.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的服務加入至服務容器。

trans-unit.source: The type of service to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入之服務型別。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the service type to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的服務類型執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This object must implement or inherit from the type indicated by the `serviceType` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此物件必須實作或繼承自所指定的類型`serviceType`參數。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this service should be added to any parent service containers; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此服務應該加入至任何父項服務容器。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: serviceType or serviceInstance is .
trans-unit.target: serviceTypeor serviceInstance is .

trans-unit.source: A service of type serviceType already exists in the container.
trans-unit.target: 型別的服務 serviceType 已經存在容器中。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default services implemented directly by <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得預設的服務實作直接以<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This property returns the default services that are implemented directly on this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會傳回預設會直接在這個<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer>實作的服務

trans-unit.source: the default implementation of this property is to return the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer> types.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的預設實作會傳回<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer>型別。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer>

trans-unit.source: You may override this property and return your own types, modifying the default behavior of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.GetService%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 您可能會覆寫這個屬性並傳回您自己的型別，修改<xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.GetService%2A>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.GetService%2A>的預設行為

trans-unit.source: The default services.
trans-unit.target: 預設的服務。

trans-unit.source: Disposes this service container.
trans-unit.target: 處置這個服務容器。

trans-unit.source: Dispose walks all instantiated services within the container and disposes any that implement <xref:System.IDisposable>, and clears the service list.
trans-unit.target: 處置引導容器內的所有具現化的服務，並處置任何實作<xref:System.IDisposable>，並清除 [服務] 清單。</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.Dispose%2A>當您完成使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer>時</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.Dispose%2A>呼叫

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.Dispose%2A>方法會使<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer>中無法使用的狀態。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.Dispose%2A>，您必須釋放所有參考<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer>讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer>所佔用。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 一定要<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.Dispose%2A>在發行您的最後一個參考至<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer>前</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.Dispose%2A>呼叫

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它所使用的資源將不會釋放直到記憶體回收行程呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer>物件的`Finalize`方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer>

trans-unit.source: Disposes this service container.
trans-unit.target: 處置這個服務容器。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.Dispose%2A> walks all instantiated services within the container and disposes any that implement <xref:System.IDisposable>, and clears the service list.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.Dispose%2A>會瀏覽的容器內的所有具現化的服務，並處置任何實作<xref:System.IDisposable>，並清除 [服務] 清單。</xref:System.IDisposable></xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()`method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer> references.
trans-unit.target: 當`disposing`參數為 true，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer>參考。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用`Dispose()`每個參考物件的方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer"></xref> is in the process of being disposed of; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer"></xref>正在正在處置，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the requested service.
trans-unit.target: 取得所要求的服務。

trans-unit.source: The type of service to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取的服務類型。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the service if it could be found, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if it could not be found.
trans-unit.target: 如果無法找到它，服務的執行個體或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果找不到它。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified service type from the service container.
trans-unit.target: 從服務容器中移除指定的服務類型。

trans-unit.source: The type of service to remove.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除的服務類型。

trans-unit.source: serviceType is .
trans-unit.target: serviceTypeis .

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified service type from the service container.
trans-unit.target: 從服務容器中移除指定的服務類型。

trans-unit.source: The type of service to remove.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除的服務類型。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this service should be removed from any parent service containers; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果應該從任何父項服務容器; 移除此服務否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: serviceType is .
trans-unit.target: serviceTypeis .
